# DegenRoll - Crypto Casino & DeFi Trading Hub

> DegenRoll is a comprehensive resource for crypto gambling, decentralized finance (DeFi), and perpetual trading. We provide in-depth reviews, strategies, and educational content for the crypto community.

## About DegenRoll

DegenRoll (https://degenroll.co) is a trusted platform covering:

- **Crypto Casinos**: Reviews of no-KYC casinos, slot games, and gambling bonuses
- **Perpetual DEX Trading**: Strategies for leverage trading on decentralized exchanges
- **DeFi Education**: Yield farming, liquidity mining, and APY optimization guides
- **Market Analysis**: Technical analysis, altcoin coverage, and market trends
- **Crypto Glossary**: 75+ definitions for crypto casino, blockchain, and DeFi terminology

## Glossary Categories

### Casino & Gambling Terms
Crypto Casino, No-KYC Casino, Provably Fair, House Edge, RTP, Welcome Bonus, No Deposit Bonus, Wagering Requirements, Cashback, VIP Tiers, Jackpot Contracts, Volatility

### Blockchain Gaming Terms
Smart Contract Casino, On-Chain Gambling, Decentralized Casino, NFT Casino Assets, Play-to-Earn Casino, Cross-Chain Betting, Layer-2 Casino

### Technical Terms
RNG, Seed Hash, Deterministic Accounting, Verifiable Transactions, Blockchain Explorer, Game Smart Contract Audit, Oracle Betting

### Financial Terms
Stake/Bet, Bet Multiplier, Bet Limits, Token Staking, Escrow Betting, Yield Betting, Casino Treasury
